about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of Vera Mills, a deeply troubled character in PSYCHOLOG.

This demo showcases the mechanics, settings and atmosphere of the main game.

Experience the nightmarish reality of an individual whose obsession with her appearance begins to dominate her life.
